segments.text: Ashley , what a great dinner party !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , Joe . What would you like to drink with your meal ? I can offer you wine , mango juice , or water .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excellent choice . Can I dish you up some chicken ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about some salad to go with your chicken ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to have rice with your chicken ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I think that rice will go perfectly with my chicken !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good ! Julie , if you could pass this plate down to Joe , I think we are all set .
segments.speaker: S2
